ygData.subject: Re: Pricing and Profits
ygData.msgSnippet: Right ok I have to get into this conversation RIGHT NOW.  I am a 14th lvl enchanter on Rallos Zek, and either the market on the care bear servers is much
ygData.messageBody:
Right ok I have to get into this conversation RIGHT NOW. I am a 14th lvl
enchanter on Rallos Zek, and either the market on the care bear servers is
much healthier or I'm really having a LOT of bad luck. I'm lucky if I can
sell a new silver jaded ring for 10 plat, and those bloodstone earrings are
really my main staple since everyone wants earrings these days. For all
you people with +1000 plat in the bank.. well I'd really like to hear your
methods of achieving this... I'm ALWAYS hovering under 20 platinum before I
blow it all on Jewels and metals... and I've never had more than 30 pat
total inthe bank! WHAT ARE YOU DOING THAT I'M NOT?!? You have obviously
some secrets that I am completely unaware of, and I'd sure like some hints.
Currently my enc is around crushbone since Kelethin is a good place for
materials (but BAD for markets) and I find its difficult to find a good
place to 'hang around' off of faywer (gnomes arent as loved as they should
be). I suppose some of this has to do with being on RAllos Zek and I
should assume some level of difficulty but I really would like to explore
this skill to its fullest. PLEASE?

Cogg
